summary:
Pizza Earring BY Matt Furie - Matt lost his beloved Pizza Earring back in 2008, Lets bring it back for him! Lost since 2008

 Would Pepe and the Boys Club even exist without Matt ​Furie's pizza earring? - We don't know for sure, but we do ​know that Matt Furie loved his pizza earring and once ​said he couldn't draw without it.
